scripts.publish-extension: npm run release && jszip-cli add --noconfig --force -o built/Release/Chrome/Crunchyroll-With-Better-Seasons.zip built/Chrome/*
scripts.release: webpack --mode=production && mkdirp built/Release/Chrome/ && rimraf built/Release/Chrome/Crunchyroll-With-Better-Seasons.crx && crx3 -p built/Release/Chrome/Crunchyroll-With-Better-Seasons.pem -o built/Release/Chrome/Crunchyroll-With-Better-Seasons.crx built/Chrome/
